channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Secure Proxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Secure Proxy

item.title: CVE-2022-22336|2024-09-17T04:09:01.969Z -- ibm -- sterling%20secure%20proxy
item.description: IBM Sterling External Authentication Server and IBM Sterling Secure Proxy 6.0.3.0, 6.0.2.0, and 3.4.3.2 could allow a remote user to consume resources causing a denial of service due to a resource leak. IBM X-Force ID: 219395.
